name: Dramatic Hero Section with Network Visualization
description: Create an immersive hero section with animated network graph background and inline search

stories.title: Network graph supports hero variant
stories.description: As a developer, I want the NetworkGraph component to support a 'hero' variant so that it renders appropriately as a full-width background
acceptance_criteria: Hero variant uses softer colors for better text contrast
Hero variant detects mobile and reduces nodes to ~8 for performance
Component exports correctly and builds without type errors
stories.notes: Use brand colors: Terracotta (#D97757), Sage (#2D5F4F), Ochre (#D4A373), Cream (#F8F6F1)

stories.title: Create HeroSearch component with dropdown
stories.description: As a visitor, I want a prominent search bar in the hero so that I can quickly discover stories
acceptance_criteria: Large search input with search icon
Debounced API call to /api/search/global on typing
Dropdown shows results grouped by: Stories, Storytellers, Themes
Clicking result or pressing enter navigates to result
stories.notes: Suggestions: Elder wisdom, Land connection, Youth stories, Healing journeys

stories.title: Rebuild HeroSection with network background
stories.description: As a visitor, I want an immersive hero section so that I understand what Empathy Ledger is about
acceptance_criteria: Centered content: headline, tagline, HeroSearch component
CTA buttons: Browse Stories, Meet Storytellers
tests_required: Visual test captures new hero design
stories.notes: Animation timing: 0ms graph, 200ms logo, 400ms headline, 600ms tagline, 800ms search, 1000ms chips

stories.title: Create global search API endpoint
stories.description: As a system, I need a search API so that the hero search can query stories, storytellers, and themes
acceptance_criteria: Returns results grouped by type: stories, storytellers, themes
stories.notes: Use existing Supabase queries, add text search on title/name fields
